resources.string: Indulge in a luxurious, creamy body lotion enriched with a blend of 7 natural oils; Avocado, Jojoba, Olive, Macademia, Shea, Borage and Wheat germ that are rich in omega 3+6+7+9 and vitamins A and E. The non greasy formula is easily absorbed, provides a velvet touch on the skin.

Banish rough, dry and bumpy skin from the neck down. This moisturising, silky body spot exfoliant contains salicylic acid (BHA) which works to gently exfoliate dry, rough skin, for example on the back or shoulders (bacne). It leaves skin hydrated, smooth and soft. BHA also helps improve the appearance of hard clogged pores on arms and legs. With continued use skin is left smoother, younger-looking and more radiant.
Hair Treament Oil 水梨花+玫瑰+小蒼蘭
